revision.text:
There is a bunch of example pages for R and octave available:
* '''Raw''': output from the program(s) as it is * '''HTML''': some HTML output created by the program(s) * '''Graphics''': generate graphics from the program(s) * '''Mixed''': mixed text output and graphics from the program(s) * '''Wiki''': only MediaWiki output is created by the program(s) * '''Interaction''': hwo to use interactive programs
{| class="wikitable" |+ Example pages for different type of output ! ! Raw ! HTML ! Graphics ! Mixed ! Wiki ! colspan="2" | Interaction |- align="center" ! R | [[R Extension/R - Raw|Raw]] | [[R Extension/R - HTML|HTML]] | [[R Extension/R - Graphics|Graphics]] | [[R Extension/R - Mixed|Mixed]] | [[R Extension/R - Wiki|Wiki]] | [[R Extension/R - Interaction without jQuery|without jQuery]] | [[R Extension/R - Interaction with jQuery|with jQuery]] |- align="center" ! Octave | [[R Extension/Octave - Raw|Raw]] | [[R Extension/Octave - HTML|HTML]] | [[R Extension/Octave - Graphics|Graphics]] | [[R Extension/Octave - Mixed|Mixed]] | [[R Extension/Octave - Wiki|Wiki]] | [[R Extension/Octave - Interaction without jQuery|without jQuery]] | [[R Extension/Octave - Interaction with jQuery|with jQuery]] |}
----
'''Note''': The version 0.14 of the extension will not work properly with
* MediaWiki version 1.21.x or older.
----
[[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="4" | '''Basic''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 
1:10
| 
1:10
| 
1:10
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | 1:10 | 1:10 | 1:10 |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="4" | '''Iframe''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 
1:10
| 
1:10
| 
1:10
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | 1:10 | 1:10 | 1:10 |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Table''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6
g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax)
m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob)
dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1)
colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax)
rownames(m) <- format(0:x)
outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f'))
| 

prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6
g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax)
m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob)
dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1)
colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax)
rownames(m) <- format(0:x)
outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f'))
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6 g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax) m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob) dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1) colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax) rownames(m) <- format(0:x) outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f')) | prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6 g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax) m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob) dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1) colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax) rownames(m) <- format(0:x) outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f')) |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''HTML''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6
g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax)
m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob)
dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1)
colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax)
rownames(m) <- format(0:x)
outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f'))
| 

prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6
g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax)
m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob)
dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1)
colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax)
rownames(m) <- format(0:x)
outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f'))
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6 g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax) m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob) dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1) colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax) rownames(m) <- format(0:x) outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f')) | prob=0.15; nmin=1; nmax=7; x=6 g <- expand.grid(0:6, nmin:nmax) m <- pbinom(g[,1], g[,2], prob) dim(m) <- c(x+1, nmax-nmin+1) colnames(m) <- format(nmin:nmax) rownames(m) <- format(0:x) outMatrix(m, title='x-n', format=list(numeric='%.4f')) |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Graphics''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(1:10, 1:10)
| 

pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(1:10, 1:10)
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(1:10, 1:10) | pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(1:10, 1:10) |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Mixed''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

t <- 1:10
t
pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(t,t)
dev.off()
-t
pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(t,-t)
dev.off()
| 

t <- 1:10
t
pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(t,t)
dev.off()
-t
pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3)
plot(t,-t)
dev.off()
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | t <- 1:10 t pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(t,t) dev.off() -t pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(t,-t) dev.off() | t <- 1:10 t pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(t,t) dev.off() -t pdf(rpdf, width=3, height=3) plot(t,-t) dev.off() |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Wiki''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

x<-matrix(1:12,ncol=3)
rownames(x) <- sprintf("row %i", 1:4)
colnames(x) <- sprintf("col %i", 1:3)
outMatrix(x, title="x")
| 

x<-matrix(1:12,ncol=3)
rownames(x) <- sprintf("row %i", 1:4)
colnames(x) <- sprintf("col %i", 1:3)
outMatrix(x, title="x")
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | x<-matrix(1:12,ncol=3) rownames(x) <- sprintf("row %i", 1:4) colnames(x) <- sprintf("col %i", 1:3) outMatrix(x, title="x") | x<-matrix(1:12,ncol=3) rownames(x) <- sprintf("row %i", 1:4) colnames(x) <- sprintf("col %i", 1:3) outMatrix(x, title="x") |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Wiki''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

from:   
to:   
  



if (exists("from")) from <- as.numeric(from) else from <- 1
if (exists("to")) to <- as.numeric(to) else to <- 10
from:to
| 

from:  
to:   
 
 


if (exists("from")) from <- as.numeric(from) else from <- 1
if (exists("to")) to <- as.numeric(to) else to <- 10
from:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | from: to: if (exists("from")) from <- as.numeric(from) else from <- 1 if (exists("to")) to <- as.numeric(to) else to <- 10 from:to Note: Any press on the '''Submit''' button will create an error! | from: to: if (exists("from")) from <- as.numeric(from) else from <- 1 if (exists("to")) to <- as.numeric(to) else to <- 10 from:to |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |- ! colspan="2" | For the use use of jQuery the Mediawiki version 1.22.x or higher is required: your MediaWiki version is {{CURRENTVERSION}} ! |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Wiki''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
| to: 
| 
| 
| 
|}
 


if (exists("slito")) to <- as.numeric(slito) else to <- 10
0:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view''q | {| | to: | | | |} if (exists("slito")) to <- as.numeric(slito) else to <- 10 0:to |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
| from: 
| 
| to: 
| 
|}
 


if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1
if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10
from:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | {| | from: | | to: | |} if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1 if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10 from:to |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
|  even numbers
| 
|}
 


even <- exists("even")
even
sequ <- 1:10
if (even) sequ <- 2*sequ
sequ
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | {| | even numbers | |} even <- exists("even") even sequ <- 1:10 if (even) sequ <- 2*sequ sequ |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
|  First choice
|  Second choice
| 
|}
 


if (!exists("choice")) choice <- "First choice"
choice
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | {| | First choice | Second choice | |} if (!exists("choice")) choice <- "First choice" choice |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
| from: 
| 
| to: 
| 
| 
|}
 


if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1
if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10
from:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | {| | from: | | to: | | |} if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1 if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10 from:to |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

{|
| from: 
| 
| to: 
| 
|}
 


if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1
if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10
from:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | {| | from: | | to: | |} if (exists("sli_0")) from <- as.numeric(sli_0) else from <- 1 if (exists("sli_1")) to <- as.numeric(sli_1) else to <- 10 from:to |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="4" | '''Basic''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 
1:10
| 
1:10
| 
1:10
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | 1:10 | 1:10 | 1:10 |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="4" | '''Iframe''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 
1:10
| 
1:10
| 
1:10
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | 1:10 | 1:10 | 1:10 |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Table''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

x=magic(5);
outMatrix(x, "title", "magic(5)", "format.numeric", "%.0f");
| 

x=magic(5);
outMatrix(x, "title", "magic(5)", "format.numeric", "%.0f");
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | x=magic(5); outMatrix(x, "title", "magic(5)", "format.numeric", "%.0f"); | x=magic(5); outMatrix(x, "title", "magic(5)", "format.numeric", "%.0f"); |} [[Category:ExtR]]

{| width="100%" | align="left" | [[R Extension|<< Back to R Extension page]] | align="right" | [http://mars.wiwi.hu-berlin.de/mediawiki/sk/index.php/R_Extension_for_MediaWiki R Extension documentation] |} {| width="100%" |- bgcolor="#666666" | colspan="3" | '''Wiki''' |- bgcolor="#999999" valign="top" |
''Edit view'' | 

from:   
to:   
  



if (exist("from", "var")) 
  from = str2double(from);
else
  from = 1;
end
if (exist("to", "var"))
  to = str2double(to);
else
  to = 10;
end
from:to
| 

from:  
to:   
 
 


if (exist("from", "var")) 
  from = str2double(from);
else
  from = 1;
end
if (exist("to", "var"))
  to = str2double(to);
else
  to = 10;
end
from:to
|- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" valign="top" |
''Page view'' | from: to: if (exist("from", "var")) from = str2double(from); else from = 1; end if (exist("to", "var")) to = str2double(to); else to = 10; end from:to Note: Any press on the '''Submit''' button will create an error! | from: to: if (exist("from", "var")) from = str2double(from); else from = 1; end if (exist("to", "var")) to = str2double(to); else to = 10; end from:to |} [[Category:ExtR]]
